verbose_text: Interestingly, bisindolymaleimide (BIM), a selective inhibitor for PKCalpha, beta1, beta2, gamma, delta, and epsilon isoforms, blocked the effect of U-50,488 on GIS (XREF_FIG).
evidence: BIM), a selective inhibitor for PKCalpha, beta1, beta2, gamma, delta, and epsilon isoforms              , blocked the effect of U-50,488
